name: New New World
description:
You take on the role of a conquistador who voyages onto a new planet.  You are the first ever there and your goals is to spread the Faith.

Controls

  • Swing sword: Space
  • Shoot from arquebus: Mouse Left
  • Throw the Holy book: Mouse Right
  • Move: WASD or arrow keys
  • Quit game: Alt+F4

Gameplay tip

You need to calm the enemies first, then you can throw books at them to convert them.

Pro tactics

Keep converted enemies around to protect you!

Credits

  • LOVO AI - Voice of Austin Hopkins
  • Sounds: https://www.musicfox.com/, https://www.zapsplat.com/
